name: 10600 Final
description:
Right click to move

Left click to use pistol,

Space to use machine gun

Shoot red enemies to disable them

Levels are randomly generated: Start in the green room, find the treasure in the yellow room, defeat the boss in the blue room, exit to the next floor via the red room. Repeat.

This is just a concept/prototype to test random/procedural generation. Game is not finished.
